titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for a general fast and humiliation throughout the whole kingdom
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Kensington, the thirtieth day of November, 1695, in the seventh year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
